title: Piquant cod chowder
ingredients: ['2 sprigs each of parsley and fresh thyme', '1 bay leaf', '7.5 cm (3 in) piece of celery stick', '1 can chopped tomatoes, about 400 g', '750 ml (1¼ pints) fish stock', '4 tbsp medium cider', '1 large onion, chopped', '400 g (14 oz) waxy potatoes, cut into large chunks', '225 g (8 oz) carrots, thickly sliced', '225 g (8 oz) courgettes, thickly sliced', '225 g (8 oz) green beans, cut into short lengths', '1 yellow or red pepper, seeded and sliced', '550 g (1¼ lb) cod fillet, skinned and cut into large pieces', 'salt and pepper', 'To garnish', '2 tbsp finely chopped parsley', '1 tbsp snipped fresh chives', 'finely shredded zest of 1 lemon']
